project.description: 获取社区所有公网ip地址的高危端口； 存放位置：openeuler账号 obs://obs-for-openeuler-developer/elastic-ips-port/； 当前使用zhaochunjiang账号aksk，若账号失效后，请使用新账号aksk替换当前aksk； 文件以xlsx格式输出；

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
echo `id` date_str=`date +%Y%m%d` if ! hash obsutil 2>/dev/null;then wget https://obs-community.obs.cn-north-1.myhuaweicloud.com/obsutil/current/obsutil_linux_amd64.tar.gz tar -xzvf obsutil_linux_amd64.tar.gz && chmod 755 ./obsutil_linux_amd64_5.3.4/obsutil && mv ./obsutil_linux_amd64_5.3.4/obsutil /usr/bin/obsutil rm -rf ./obsutil* fi
if ! hash nmap 2>/dev/null;then apt install nmap -y fi
while : do if [ ! -e scan_port.py ];then wget https://github.com/Open-Infra-Ops/huaweicloud-tools/raw/main/scan_port/scan_port.py else break fi done
# download secret file from OBS bucket obsutil cp obs://obs-for-openeuler-developer/secret-files/collect_elastic_public_ip.yaml ./scan_port.yaml -i=${AK} -k=${SK} -e=${EP} ls ./ -al
# build python3 scan_port.py mv 公网IP端口扫描统计表.xlsx elastic-ips-port-${date_str}.xlsx
# upload xlsx file to OBS bucket obsutil cp ./elastic-ips-port-${date_str}.xlsx obs://obs-for-openeuler-developer/elastic-ips-port/elastic-ips-port-${date_str}.xlsx -i=${AK} -k=${SK} -e=${EP}
